title: Japan Average Monthly Wages
description: Wages in Japan increased to 314067 JPY/Month in September from 313161 JPY/Month in August of 2022. Wages in Japan averaged 326102.37 JPY/Month from 1970 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 883791 JPY/Month in December of 1997 and a record low of 52914 JPY/Month in February of 1970. In Japan, wages are benchmarked using average monthly earnings. This page provides - Japan Average Monthly Wages - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare, Japan
